text: Waldyr Geraldo Boccardo (28 January 1936 – 18 November 2018) was a Brazilian basketball player. Boccardo was born in São Manuel, Brazil. He was a member of the team that won the title at the 1959 World Championship and the bronze medal at the 1960 Olympics. Boccardo died in Rio de Janeiro on 18 November 2018 from pneumonia at the age of 82.Campeão mundial com a seleção em 1959, Waldir Boccardo morre aos 82 anos, no Rio de Janeiro ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Brazil Category:Brazilian basketball players Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo (state)
title: Waldyr Boccardo
